entry.title: Payment Protocol for Face-to-face Payments
entry.summary: In this context, Alex Kotenko is wondering about the possibility of implementing HTTP-over-Bluetooth. However, the other person in the conversation believes that HTTP may be overkill and come with potential downsides. They suggest considering SPDY instead, which could potentially be quicker and leaner. Ultimately, they decide that implementing HTTP-over-Bluetooth should not be done unless it is deemed necessary during implementation.
